relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented x3, lying comfortably in bed.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes/rales.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, non-distended, appropriately mildly tender to palpation. Surgical incisions clean, dry, well approximated.
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused.
